title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2025-1039: Important priority package update for amazon-ecr-credential-helper
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2025-22871:
	The net/http package accepted data in the chunked transfer encoding containing an invalid chunk-size line terminated by a bare LF. When used in conjunction with a server or proxy which incorrectly interprets a bare LF in a chunk extension as part of the extension, this could permit request smuggling.
